sentences.en: Average home prices nationally, however, cannot yet be called a bubble.
sentences.cn: 然而, 全国范围内的平均房价上涨不能被划入泡沫的范畴.

sentences.en: Duncan Campbell is nationally known for his investigative work.
sentences.cn: 邓肯·坎贝尔因其调查工作闻名全国。

sentences.en: Home appreciation nationally has run about 1 % above inflation over time.
sentences.cn: 总的来说,全国的房屋增值幅度高于通胀率1%左右.

sentences.en: I can't bear classing people together nationally, and liking or disliking them.
sentences.cn: 我无法接受按国籍划分人, 然后决定喜欢还是厌恶他们.

sentences.en: It is an economical way of communicating locally, nationally and internationally.
sentences.cn: 使用网际网路对国际 、 国内或地方性的通讯,是十分的经济.

sentences.en: Nationally we now have more than 1,000 people we can call activists.
sentences.cn: 在全国我们已有一千多可称为积极分子的人.

sentences.en: Reports nationally have mentioned the Wolves as a possible destination.
sentences.cn: 举国一致报告已经提到如可能的目的地的狼.

sentences.en: The individual and team winners from those areas then compete nationally.
sentences.cn: 各个赛区的单人和团体冠军将参加全国的比赛.

sentences.en: The place is nationally known for its melons and fruit, especially its seedless grapes.
sentences.cn: 这里的瓜果, 尤其是无核葡萄驰名全国.

sentences.en: The president's popularity nationally is at an all-time low.
sentences.cn: 总统在全国的人气目前正处于历史最低点。

sentences.en: The President's speech was broadcast nationally.
sentences.cn: 总统的演说在全国广播.
这个节目曾在全国播放过。

sentences.en: The programme will be broadcast nationally.
This 32 - year - old has now become Finland's inter nationally most famous folk hero.
sentences.cn: 这位32 岁 的年轻人,是目前芬兰最具国际知名度的民族英雄.

sentences.en: To redistribute profits nationally so as to minimize taxes is certain to get particular partner.
sentences.cn: 通过在全国范围内重新分配利润,以便使纳税减至最低限度,这必然会使公司同这个特殊的合伙人陷入矛盾纠纷之中.

sentences.en: Unlike public libraries, school libraries are not run according to any nationally - directed policy.
sentences.cn: 与公共图书馆不同, 学校图书馆并不是按照某一全国性的指导方针兴办的.

words.tran_cn: 国家的；国民的；民族的；国立的
民族主义的（等于nationalistic）；国家主义的；民族独立主义的
本国的；土著的；天然的；与生俱来的；天赋的
民族主义；国家主义；民族特性
民族主义者；国家主义者；民族独立主义者
把…收归国有；使具有某国国籍；使成国家
使国有化；使民族化；使归化；使成国家
全国性地；以国民立场地；举国一致地

trans.tran_cn: 在全国范围内，全国性地，作为整个民族
trans.tran_en: by or to everyone in the nation
